She has been in this business for five years and she sells a variety of items such as noodles, sugar, shampoo and other groceries. 

In the future, Ma.Gloria would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Ella es Daniela una joven de 24 años de edad, muy humilde, baja de recursos, que le gustaría iniciar un negocio de venta de alimentos para colaborar en los gastos de su casa donde pasan necesidades. 
Gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre le gustaría iniciar con una venta de fritos por lo que necesita de tu gran apoyo para impulsar un pequeño préstamo con lo que comprara una fritadora, una pipeta de gas, una mesa, utensilios y materia prima para iniciar poco a poco, con la intención de apoyar a su hogar y porque no hacer de la venta de alimentos el medio de sostenimiento y el motor de sueños para comprar en un futuro una casa propia
texts.en:
Daniela is a young woman who is 24 years of age. She is extremely humble and has limited resources. Daniela would like to start a business where she can sell food so that she can cover her ongoing household expenses.

Thanks to the lessons she learned from her mother, she would like to start out by selling fried foods. With the support of a small loan from Kiva lenders, Daniela will be able to buy a deep fryer, a propane gas tank, a table, utensils, and other supplies for gradually starting her business. She intends to support her household, so she figures why not sell food as a way of making a living. This will also propel her dream of buying a house of her own in the future.

loans.use: to buy a deep fryer, a propane gas tank, a table, utensils, and other supplies for starting a food business.

loans.name: Ma. Elma

texts.en:
Ma. Elma is 47 years old and married with six children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Ma. Elma has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Ma. Elma requested a PHP 20000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell.

Ma. Elma has been in this business for twelve years. In the future, Ma. Elma would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Ablewa

texts.fr: Abléwa est une femme mariée et mère de quatre enfants. Agée de 57 ans, Abléwa vit à Akodessewa pour exercer ses activités quotidiennes. Pour réaliser son revenu, Abléwa achète des nattes au marché d’Attikpodji une fois par mois et revend dans son quartier à ses clients. Pour commander de nouvelles nattes, Abléwa demande ce prêt pour réaliser ses attentes. Abléwa désire apprendre à tisser les nattes et fournir ses clients en grandes quantités.
texts.en: Abléwa is married and the mother of four children. She is 57 years old and lives in Akodessewa so that she can carry out her daily activities. In order to earn her income, Abléwa buys mats in the Attikpodji market once a month. She resells them in her neighborhood to her clients. In order to buy new mats, Abléwa is asking for a loan to meet her needs. She would like to learn to weave mats and supply her clients with large quantities.

loans.use: buy 6 piles of mats.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy soap.

loans.name: Maravillosas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MARAVILLOSAS” iniciará el noveno ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Pascuala es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, venta de CD’s, venta de salchipapas, venta de ropa, salón de belleza, venta de frazadas, venta de verduras, venta de frutas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Pascuala es integrante, ella indica que hace seis años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de mantas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años aprendiendo de su amiga quien también trabajaba en este negocio, con el pasar del tiempo y con un pequeño capital decide emprender un negocio independiente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de mantas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Maravillosas” is starting its ninth loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani Community Center. This group consists of eight members and is led by a Board of Directors in which Sra. Pascuala serves as its president. The members of this Communal Bank engage in various businesses such as managing a neighborhood store, selling CDs, selling “salchipapas” [sausages and fried potatoes], selling clothes, operating a beauty salon, selling blankets, selling vegetables, and selling fruit.

This loan will benefit small entrepreneurs such as Sra. Pascuala. She says that she joined Pro Mujer six years ago after receiving an invitation from a friend who is also a client of the organization. Pascuala currently has a business of selling blankets. She is knowledgeable about this business because she learned the trade several years ago from a friend who was also in the same line of work. As time passed and with a small amount of capital, she decided to establish an independent business of her own.

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her capital for buying blankets in bulk. She will acquire her merchandise from the wholesale vendors in the city of La Paz and then sell her products from her retail location. Working in this manner enables her to generate income to support her family. Pascuala is married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Pascuala said that she enjoys the savings account offered by the organization.

loans.use: to buy blankets in bulk.

loans.name: Yessica Marcela

texts.es:
Yessica tiene 21 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su hijo y esposo en el distrito de Buenos Aires que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, además del comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, actividad que realiza desde hace más de 4 años contando con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los pobladores de la zona. El presente crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de cerdos para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Yessica espera incrementar sus niveles de ventas lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Yessica is 21 years old and lives in her own home along with her husband and son. They reside in the District of Buenos Aires in Morropón Province, which is located in the region of Piura on the northern coast of Peru. Life in this community is peaceful and the residents engage in agriculture, livestock breeding, and trade.

Yessica raises and sells pigs. She has been in this business for more than four years and has the necessary experience. Yessica has received good personal and work-related references from the residents in her area. This current loan will be used to buy a large quantity of pigs in order to increase the inventory of her business. With this loan, Yessica hopes to increase her sales levels and be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy several pigs.

loans.name: Ma. Nelia

texts.en:
As a married mother of ten children, Ma. Nelia works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell livestock business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. She is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF in order to buy more livestock to sell.

Ma. Nelia has been sustaining her business activities through her past ten loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and to continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more livestock to sell.

loans.name: Jenifer Xiomara

texts.es:
Jenifer, de 22 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja como jornalero, en la casa solo vive ellos dos porque aún no tiene hijos.

Jenifer, tiene un pequeño cafetín en el cual tiene vende comida rápida, anteriormente ha trabajado mucho tiempo como empleada doméstica, la distancia que camina para llegar al cafetín es de 10 minutos, su pareja también le ayuda cuando tiene tiempo.

El préstamo será invertido para comprar golosinas, gaseosas, dulces, entre otros productos para su negocio.

Los sueños de Jenifer, son tener hijos y tener un cafetín más grande para generar más ingresos.
texts.en:
22 year-old Jenifer studied until senior year of high school. She is in a relationship and her partner works as a day laborer. They live alone because they don't have children yet. 

Jenifer owns a small café where she sells fast food. Before that, she worked for a long time as a maid. It takes her 10 minutes to get to the café. Her partner also helps her out when he has time.

She will use the loan to buy treats, soft drinks, and sweets, among other products for her business.

Jenifer's dreams are to have children and a bigger café to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy treats, soft drinks, and sweets, among other products, for her business.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 23 years old and married with one kid who is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Gina has a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 16,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more items like soft drinks, canned goods, rice and other groceries.

Gina has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like soft drinks, canned goods, rice and other groceries.

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en:
Jimmy is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business making and selling native mats in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy raw materials for her native mat business. She has been in this business for twenty years and also earns more income from fishing.

Jimmy has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making native mats to sell.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 44 years old and married with six children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  
 
Evangeline has a fish vending business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 26,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell. She has been in this business for 14 years. 

In the future, Evangeline would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Liezl

texts.en:
Liezl is 29 years old and married with two children, both of whom are in school.

Liezl works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from selling gasoline.

Liezl aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 55 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school.

Elena works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Elena has borrowed and repaid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for nine years and also earns an income from taking motorcycle passengers.

Elena aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Juan De Dios

texts.es: Juan de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, el se dedica desde hace 15 años al cultivo de maíz y a la crianza de ganado, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde reside y ya tiene muchos clientes, Juan esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de  semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, y la compra de un novillo para continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan, 45, lives in his own house with his mother.  For 15 years he has been growing corn and raising cattle.  He sells his products near where he lives and has many customers.

Juan is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and manures, and to buy a calf to continue working and improve his income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, manures and to buy a calf.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy soap.

loans.name: Laila Fe

texts.en:
From San Juan, Siquijor, Laila Fe has started a small business with her clothing sales, from which she earns a little income to support her parents in raising their family. 

She would like to have more inventory to continue to make profit for her family. For her capital needs, PMPC has stood by her since the start of her business. She is happy that she has been able to survive the odds of business through her determination and with her family as her inspiration. 

In order to earn more, she has applied for a loan to purchase more clothing inventory to sell. Laila Fe hopes to expand her business and be able to support her siblings in their education.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing inventory to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in his bird-buying business, as well as other small animals to increase his business.

loans.name: Luzminda

texts.en:
Luzminda signed up as a member with PMPC and availed herself of the capital required to start up a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital PMPC extends to a small-time borrower like her. 

Luzminda has been able to turn the tide in her favor and has been making good sales recently. She wants to take advantage of this good fortune so she has just taken out a loan to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, eggs, oil and soy sauce. 

In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, eggs, oil and soy sauce

loans.name: Maria Maribel

texts.es:
María, de 39 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la venta de sorbetes y tiene dos hijos.

María, tiene venta de sorbetes desde hace 7 años, su esposo le enseño a trabajar de esta manera, no tiene otro tipo de actividad económica; su negocio está a media hora de su casa y viaja en autobús y el horario de atención es de 7:30 de la mañana a 4:30 de la tarde.

María, necesita el crédito para comprar más mercadería y más equipo para el negocio, el préstamo mejorara su negocio, porque tendrá más variedad de productos.

Sus sueños son tener un local más, para vender sus sorbetes y espera que sus hijos en un futuro se encarguen del negocio.
texts.en:
Maria, 39, has a high school education.  She is married and her husband sells ice cream.  They have two children.

Maria has been selling ice cream for seven years and learned the trade from her husband.  This is her only source of income and the business is set up half an hour from her home.  She takes a bus there and works from 7:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

She is in need of a loan to buy merchandise and more equipment for the business.  The loan will improve her business because she will have more product variety to offer.

Her dream is to open another location to sell her products and that one day her children will take over the business.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise and equipment for her business.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María, de 57 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, es madre soltera de tres hijos, su pareja la dejo cuando sus hijos estaban pequeños, solo una hija y una nieta se quedaron a vivir con ella. 

María, siempre se ha dedicado a cultivar maíz, aproximadamente tiene 30 años de dedicarse al trabajo de la agricultura, todo lo que sabe lo aprendió de su padre, le enseño a sembrar maíz, maicillo y frijol.- María, también se dedica a la cría y explotación de gallinas y cerdos; ella camina una distancia de 10 kilómetros desde su casa, hasta llegar a la zona donde tiene sus cultivos, por su edad ya no lo hace tan seguido.

María, utilizara el préstamo para comprar arena, cemento, hierro y grava para arreglar su casa, antes que llegue el invierno.

El sueño de María, es poder tener su casa bien arreglada y que su nieta pueda seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Maria, 57, has a fifth grade education.  She is single and has three children.  Her partner left when the children were still young, but now only a daughter and granddaughter live at home.

Maria has always grown corn and has worked in agriculture for 30 years.  Everything she knows she learned from her father who taught her to grow corn, millet and beans.  Maria also raises chickens and pigs.  She walks ten kilometers to her cropland, but not as often as before because of her age.

Maria plans to use the loan to buy sand, cement, iron and gravel to fix up the house before winter.

Her dream is to have a house in good condition and for her granddaughter to continue her education.

loans.use: To buy sand, cement, iron and gravel to renovate her house before winter arrives.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo es un hombre de 69 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de  Nahuala, este gran hombre a pesar de su avanzada edad sigue luchado en la vida para que a  él y su esposa no parezcan  de necesidades.
Para Lorenzo el trabajo es algo sagrado pues es con lo que uno gana su pan de cada día, el desde hace 15 años se dedica a la compra y venta de banano en su casa, pues mucha gente de su comunidad conoce a Lorenzo y que calidad de banano el vende es por eso que no tiene la necesidad de tener que salir de su casa para ofrecer su producto. Para Lorenzo no hay limitaciones es por eso que él ahora quiere comprar un terreno y poder cultivar en ella, para tener otro fuente de ingreso pues él cuenta con experiencia en el cultivo de café y banano pero con lo que Lorenzo gana de su negocio no le alcanza para realizar esta compra es por eso que él solicita un préstamo para la compra de terreno.
El sueño de Lorenzo es poder contar con este préstamo para que él cuente con más terrenos y seguir cultivando.
texts.en:
Lorenzo is a 69-year-old man who lives in the community of Nahuala. Despite his age, this great man continues to press forward in life so that he and his wife won’t be in need.

Work is something that is sacred to Lorenzo since it is the means by which one is able to make a living. Since the age of 15, he has been buying and selling bananas from his house. Many people in the community know Lorenzo and the quality of the bananas he sells. For this reason, he has never had to leave his home in order to sell his product.

There are no limitations for Lorenzo, which is why he wants to buy a plot of land for farming. This will give him another source of income since he has experience with growing coffee and bananas. However, the income he earns from his business is not enough to cover this purchase. For this reason, he is requesting a loan in order to buy land.

Lorenzo dreams of receiving this loan so that he will have more land and can continue farming.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land for farming.

loans.name: Rosa Auxiliadora

texts.es:
El cantón del Carmen posee una considerable riqueza en flora y fauna, siendo una de las fuentes principales de ingreso el cultivo del plátano de la variedad Barraganete, en este lugar se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito El Palmar.
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 66  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 6 hijos, dos de ellos fallecidos y los 4  que tiene ya son mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es agricultor y criador de ganado (porcino, vacuno, avícola).
Doña Rosa se dedica a la cría de chanchos y  aves de corral, también a la comercialización de los productos que cultivan desde hace más de 40 años, ( naranja, mandarinas, cacao, plátanos, yuca), ellos tiene una  granja en la cual crían una  gran cantidad de pollos los cuales los alimentan durante dos a tres meses que es el tiempo para que ya estén listos y después de este tiempo los entrega a algunas tiendas en la localidad o también vende por libras por su casa y en pie a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa. Los cerdos en cambio los faenan y luego venden la carne por libras, lleva 40 años dedicados a esta labor con la cual salen adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar pollos, alimentos y medicinas tanto para los pollos como para los cerdos; también plantas para sembrar en su finca. Tiene cuatro años en el grupo de crédito y está  muy contenta porque  los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños son tener una finca muy grande y distribuir a toda la provincia.
texts.en:
The canton of El Carmen has a wealth of flora and fauna. One of the main sources of income in this area is the cultivation of bananas of the Barranganete variety. The members of the Communal Bank “El Palmar” meet in this place.

It is here that one can find Sra. Rosa. She is 66 years old, married, and has six children. Two of her children died and the remaining four are grown and independent. Her husband is a farmer who also raises livestock (pigs, cattle, and poultry).

Doña Rosa also raises pigs and poultry. In addition, she sells products that she has been cultivating for more than 40 years such as oranges, tangerines, cacao beans, bananas, and cassava. She and her husband have a farm where they raise a large number of chickens over a two to three month period. When the chickens are ready, they are delivered to a few shops in town or sold by the pound from their home. The pigs are butchered and the meat is sold by the pound. Rosa has been in this business for 40 years and it has allowed her to get ahead.

This loan will be used to buy chickens, feed, and medicines for both the chickens and pigs. She will also buy seedlings to plant on her farm. Rosa has been with her Communal Bank for four years and is very pleased because the loans have been approved quickly. Her dreams include having a larger farm and distributing her products throughout the entire province.

loans.use: to buy chickens, animal feed, medicines for chickens and pigs, and seedlings to plant on her farm.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 27 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas y su esposo, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda pintando y colocando la energía eléctrica  pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de pintura, materiales para instalación de energía eléctrica y pago de mano de obra y así ella y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: This young woman's face is blurred because she is 27 years old and lives in a high risk area.  She has been running a small store from home for several years.  She uses the profit from sales to cover household expenses.  The young woman lives in her own house with her two children and her husband.  She wants to renovate the home by painting and installing electric energy but her income does not cover the cost.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy paint, materials to install electricity and to pay labor costs so she and her family can live in a safer, more comfortable environment.

loans.use: To buy paint, materials for electricity installation and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Segundo Felix

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 30 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge y su hija en el distrito de Zaña que esta ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de construcción, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 10 años contando con experiencia en este sector y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Adicionalmente alquila mototaxi propia a terceros lo cual le permite tener ingresos adicionales para solventar el crédito. El destino del préstamo será para la compra de madera y herramientas para su negocio así como para brindar mantenimiento a sus actuales herramientas, con esto Segundo espera ofrecer un mejor servicio lo que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos que le van a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo, 30, lives in his own home with his wife and daughter in the district of Zaña.  It is located in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque Region on the northern coast of Peru.  The community works in commerce, agriculture and livestock farming.

Segundo works in construction services and has been in business for over ten years.  He has much experience in the sector and many steady customers who provide good personal and work references of him.  He also rents out a motortaxi to third parties for extra income to pay off debt.  He will use the loan to buy wood and tools for his business, and to pay for maintenance of his current tools.

Segundo wants to offer better service to increase his income and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wood and tools for his business, and pay for maintenance of the tools he has.

loans.name: Janet Cyntia

texts.es: JANET  de 26 años de edad,  soltera y sin hijos, es un agradable estudiante de la facultad de TERAPIA FISICA Y REABILITACION, ya está en el 3er ciclo  le falta 3 año para terminar,  con la ayuda de sus padres  está logrando muchas cosas, JANET  ha sabido salir adelante,  estudiar mucho y  así culminar sus estudios y así poder ser  exitosa en la vida. Con el préstamo otorgado ella podrá realizar los pagos de su matrícula universitaria y la vez compra de útiles de estudio que necesita. JANET   se encuentra muy agradecida  por la ayuda brindada que le está siendo  Kiva  y Edaprospo y se despide con un fuerte abrazo y diciéndoles que cumplirá la promesa de salir adelante.
texts.en: 26 year-old Janet is single and has no children. She is a pleasant student in the Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation faculty, and she is currently in her 3rd year. She is 3 years away from finishing. With her parents' help, she is achieving many things. Janet has known how to get ahead, study a lot to finish her studies, and therefore be successful in life. The loan will enable her to pay her university enrolment fees, and also buy study suppplies that she needs.Janet is very grateful for the help Kiva and Edaprospo have been providing, and she signs off with a big hug and by saying that she will fulfill her promise to succeed.

loans.use: buy study supplies

loans.name: Balcon Florido Group

texts.es: El grupo “BALCON FLORIDO” está conformado por socios dedicados a la agricultura y al comercio minorista. Betsi tiene 26 años de edad es soltera. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida rápida salchipapas hamburguesa hace 05 meses. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de mas pollo aceite platos descartable crema y embutidos.  El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Betsi es la tercera persona sentada del lado derecho.
texts.en:
The “Balcon Florido” group comprises members who work in farming and retail. 

One member, Betsi, is 26 years old and single. She has been making a living selling fast food, including sausage and chips and hamburgers for five months. She will use this loan to buy more chicken, oil, cream, cold meats, and single-use plates. 

This loan group is grateful to Kiva lenders for this loan.

In the photo, Betsi is the third person sitting on the right.

loans.use: to buy more supplies, including chicken and oil.

loans.name: Dúo Shalom Group

texts.es:
Dúo Shalom 
El cual esta integrado por la señora Iris quien es propietaria de una venta de calzado ubicado en el mercado de ciudad peronia la señora iris tiene 2 hijos a su cargo los cuales aun estudian y para quienes ella tiene grandes metas sueños y propósitos  esperando en DIOS poder cumplir cada uno de ellos  y es por ello que toca las puertas de FAPE para la adquisición de un crédito para poder invertir en el calzado esperando en DIOS poder llevar a cabo la meta que tiene para este año.
texts.en:
The “Shalom” Duo

One member of this group is Iris, who owns a business selling footwear in the Peronia city market. Iris has two children, both of whom are in school. Iris has big dreams and goals for them and hopes that God will be able to help them to achieve them. Iris has come to FAPE to apply for a loan in order to invest in footwear. She hopes that good can allow her to achieve her goals this year.

loans.use: to buy footwear to sell.

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer de 32 años de edad, su ánimo en el momento se encuentra un poco bajo, necesita apoyo y generar recursos, el motivo es que se separó de su esposo y anda superando la situación.

Juana como buena campesina fiel a sus principios y sus raíces, desempeño la actividad que le enseñaron sus padres, la cría y levante de pollos y ganando porcino ha representado los ingresos para su hogar, ella quedo a cargo de su hijo y su preocupación pasa por su mente, esa inquietud de si es lo suficiente para mantenerlo, si nunca le faltara nada, cosas que rondan por su cabeza.

Juana  solo le queda trabajar, sacar su negocio adelante y necesita sentir apoyo, por eso la invitación a que apoyen a esta empresa que con un préstamo busca comprar alimento para pollos y cerdos, comprar 6 lechones, pollos y gallinas.
texts.en:
Juana is 32 years old and is a little low on motivation as she has just separated from her husband and is trying to get over this break-up. She needs support, and to raise an income.

Like any good countryperson, Juana is faithful to her principles and to her roots. She works in the trade that her parents taught her: raising chickens and pigs. This work has provided an income for Juana’s family. Juana looks after her son and is always concerned about him. The worry of having enough to support him is always going round Juana’s mind.

Juana needs to work and move forward with her business. She needs to feel supported and so we invite you to support Juana’s business with a loan. This loan will be used to buy six suckling pigs, and chickens and hens; and to buy food for pigs and chickens.

loans.use: to buy six suckling pigs, and chickens and hens; and to buy food for pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Nelia Esther

texts.es:
Nelia junto con su esposo montaron en el año 2004 un negocio de cría de ganado y agricultura, tomaron la decisión de independizarse tener sus propias tierras, ser sus propios jefes ya que tuvieron la experiencia de trabajar para otras personas que aunque no los trataban mal, su salario era muy bajo y el trabajo era muy pesado. 
Gracias a este iniciativa Hoy Nelia junto con su esposo pueden gozar una mejor calidad de vida, sus tres hijos estudian y eso los motiva a seguir haciendo las cosas bien y buscar alternativas que le permitan hacer crecer su negocio.
Nelia solicita un préstamo el cual invertirá en la compra de una vaca e insumos para el sostenimiento de sus cultivos, insumos como riegos, abonos y pesticidas, como todavía se encuentran en cosecha este dúo dinámico no cuenta con capital y es esa la razón por la que quieren apoyarse en un préstamo el cual aprovecharan al máximo para seguir haciendo historia con su negocio.
texts.en:
In 2004, Nelia and her husband started a business in farming and cattle-raising. They decided to become independent, own their own land, and be their own bosses as when working for others, although they were not treated badly, the salary was very low and they had to work a lot for it.

Thanks to their initiative, today Nelia and her husband enjoy a higher quality of life. Their three children are in education and this motivates the couple to continue doing their work well and to look for ways to expand their business.

Nelia is applying for a loan that will be used to buy a cow and supplies to look after her crops, including irrigation equipment, manure, and pesticides. With the crops still growing, this dynamic duo do not have the money to buy supplies and so are looking for a loan to support them. Nelia and her husband will take full advantage of this loan in order to continue with their business.

loans.use: to buy a cow and supplies to look after her crops, including irrigation equipment, manure, and pesticides.

loans.name: Cleusia

texts.pt:
A sra Cleusia é casada e mãe de 01 filho que está na sua responsabilidade. O  seu esposo é motorista. 
Com o empréstimo, pretende comprar cervejas, refrigerantes, carnes, feijao, arroz , azeite para revender na sua mercaria, porém, o seu sonho é construir uma mercearia para fornecer quase todos os produtos da 1ª necessidade aos residentes da sua comunidade.
Apesar de enfrentar dificuldades financeiras, o seu desafio é reembolsar o crédito dentro do prazo acordado
texts.en: Cleusia is a married mother who cares for her young son while her husband works as a driver. She plans to use this loan to buy beer, soft drinks, meat, beans, rice and cooking oil to sell in her grocery store, and she dreams of  building a larger grocery store which would allow her to offer all the basic essentials required by her community's residents. Despite facing financial difficulties, she is committed to repaying her loan within the agreed term.

loans.use: to buy beer, soft drinks, meat, beans, rice and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.pt:
a senhora  Cristina tem 40 anos de idade, casada  e mãe de 08 filhos tres estao na sua responsabilidade e os restantes 05 estao nos seus lares. Para alem dos seus filhos, sustenta a sua sogra. 
Com o presente empréstimo será aplicado para comprar material de construção (cimento, varrões, tijoleira,  pedra, areia, estribos, arrames para aumentar a sua casa.
Ela tem como o sonho a conclusão da sua casa e abrigar os seus filhos que neste momento encontram-se a residir com a sua avó e, tem o desafio de reembolsar o empréstimo dentro do prazo estipulado mas deixa como conselho a continuidade da Instituição  em ajudar aos necessitados a desenvolverem-se através dos empréstimos que a Instituição concede.
texts.en: Cristina is a 40 year old married mother to 8 children: 3 of whom are still in her care while her remaining 5 children already live independently in their own homes. Asides from her children, she also cares for her mother-in-law. She plans to use this loan to buy building materials for her home, such as cement, building rods, bricks, stone, sand, boards and wires. She dreams of finishing the building work on her home so that her children can come back to live with her as they are currently living with their grandmother. The greatest challenge that she faces is repaying her loan within the specified term but, she tells us, she wants to help Hluvuku to continue to grant loans to those who require them for development purposes.

loans.use: to buy building materials for her home, such as cement, building rods, bricks, stone, sand, boards and wires.

loans.name: Ernsto

texts.pt:
O senhor  Ernesto de 35 anos de idade, casado e pai de 03 filhos que frequentam o ensino primário. Para além dos seus, sustenta mais uma sobrinha. Tem um estaleiro de venda de material de construção e com o empréstimo vai aplicar na compra de material eléctico como cabos eléctricos, tomadas, arrames, varrões, pregos, lãmpadas para revender.
O seu sonho é de progredir no seu negócio e ser o fornecedor de material de construção e eléctrico na sua comunidade e o seu desafio é vencer a pobreza absoluta.
texts.en: Ernesto is a 35 year old married father to 3 children who all attend primary school. Asides from his own children, he is also responsible for his young niece. He runs a builders yard where he sells building materials and he plans to use this loan to buy electrical materials to sell, such as electrical cables, plug sockets, wires, building rods, nails and lamps. He dreams of making good progress in his business and becoming the main building material supplier in his community, and the greatest challenge that he faces is overcoming absolute poverty.

loans.use: to buy electrical materials such as electrical cables, plug sockets, wires, building rods, nails and lamps to sell.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
Isidro es un reconocido habitante de la vereda el reposo, él tiene un hermoso cultivo de papaya, fruta que podemos apreciar en la foto, es un hombre muy trabajador entregado cuerpo y alma al trabajo, es soltero no tiene hijos, solo sus cultivos los cuales consciente desde que se levanta hasta que se acuesta a dormir.
Junto con sus trabajador mantiene el cultivo, su principal responsabilidad es su pago de jornal, sostener y ampliar su cultivo como es solo, necesita apoyo y la corporación Interactuar está para darle la mano, como en este momento que tiene una necesidad de comprar insumos para el sostenimiento  de sus cultivos, como lo son riegos, fertilizantes y algunos pesticidas, parte del préstamo lo destinara al pago de jornales.
texts.en:
Isidro is a well-known ihabitant of the community of El Reposo.  He grows a beautiful papaya crop, as shown in the picture.  He is a hard-working man who dedicates body and soul to his work.  He is single and has no children.  His crops are the only thing he looks after from the time he gets up until he goes to bed.

He maintains the crops with help from day workers.  His main responsibility is paying daily wages, maintaining and expanding his crop.  He is in need of support and the Interactuar corporation is there to give him a hand.  At this time he is in need of supplies for maintenance of his crops: irrigation, fertilizers and pesticides.  Part of the loan will go to the day laborers.

loans.use: To buy supplies for his crops: irrigation, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy daily consumables.

loans.name: Gustavo Enrique

texts.es:
El señor Gustavo es un campesino muy entregado a su familia y cultivo, sus dos pasiones, las cuales atiende desde que se levanta hasta que se acuesta, su negocio de cultivo lo inicio por necesidad económica ya que tiene una familia grande que alimentar, su familia la constituyen 5 hijos y junto con su pareja trabajan para mejorar y sacar adelante 	su hogar.
Como hace poco Gustavo inicio como independiente su cultivos necesitan ciertos arreglos uno de ellos es implementar un sistema de riego, por lo cual se encuentra en este momento pidiendo ayuda crediticia, necesita de urgencia construirlo y con el monto solicitado quiere construir su sistema de riego y pagar la respectiva mano de obra.
texts.en:
Gustavo is a farmer who is very dedicated to his family and crops, which are his two passions.  He looks after them from the time he gets up until he goes to bed.  He started growing crops out of necessity to feed a large family.  He and his partner have five children and they work together to support the household.

Since Gustavo established himself as an independent crop-grower recently he must set up an irrigation system and is therefore requesting a loan.  It will be used to build an irrigation system and hire workers.

loans.use: To build an irrigation system and hire workers.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina es una mujer de 61 años de edad, ella siempre ha sido ama de casa, 	es madre de 2 hijos adolecentes, su esposo siempre fue el soporte financiero de su hogar, pero este enfermo y ahora no puede trabajar como antes, consciente de la situación, por gusto, por amor Luz Marina quiere apoyar a su esposo y lo quiere hacer iniciando su propio negocio, iniciar como vendedora de ropa para hombre y mujer, vender calzado y por ello solicita su ayuda, para que la apoyen en un préstamo el cual invertirá en la compra de surtido de blusas, camisas, blue jean, tenis y sandalias.
Con esta actividad quiere solventar el déficit monetario que se encuentra presente en su hogar y apoyar a su pareja en su difícil momento.
texts.en:
Luz Marina, 61, always has been a homemaker.  She has two adolescent children and her husband was the one who supported the household economically.  But now he is ill and cannot work like he used to.  Aware of the situation, and out of love for her husband, Luz Marina wants to help him by starting her own business.

She will begin selling men and women's clothing and shoes.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy a variety of blouses, shirts, blue jeans, tennis shoes and sandals.  With this activity she hopes to take care of the money deficit in her household and support her partner at such a difficult time.

loans.use: To buy a variety of blouses, shirts, blue jeans, tennis shoes and sandals.

loans.name: Tres Regalos Group

texts.es: Tres mujeres emprendedoras solicitan por primera ocasión el financiamiento en ADIM para sus negocios con el objetivo de capitalizar sus negocios, quien lo coordina es Suhey una señora que tiene la edad de 38 años que es propietaria de un salón de belleza en su domicilio desde hace dos años, anteriormente se dedicaba a realizar los trabajos a domicilio hasta lograr tener este negocio en su vivienda, por lo que ha demostrado que perseverando se consigue las metas, ella solicita el crédito para la compra de tintes, tratamientos para el cabello, pinturas labiales, pinturas de uñas, etc. El resto de las integrantes son, Nohelia que tiene la edad de 28 años y se dedica a la venta de refrescos desde hace dos años de manera ambulante, y Yubelka de 23 años de edad propietaria de un taller de costura esto gracias a la ayuda de su mamá logró independizarse.
texts.en:
Three women entrepreneurs are requesting their first loan through ADIM in order to capitalize their businesses.  Suhey, 38, is the coordinator of the group and the owner of a beauty salon she has been running for two years.  She used to work door-to-door until she was able to set up the business at home, so this shows perseverence in achieving her goals.

She is requesting a loan to buy hair color, treatments, lipstick, nail polish, etc.  The other members of the group are Nohelia, 28, who has been working as a street vendor selling soft drinks for two years, and Yubelka, 23, who has a sewing shop after her mother helped her to establish herself independently.

loans.use: To buy hair color, treatments, lipstick, etc.

loans.name: Juana Sabina

texts.es:
Desde el año 2010 la señora Juana inicio un negocio que cambió radicalmente su vida, ella es madre de 2 hijos los cuales tiene 6 y 8 años de edad, se encontraba en casa, buscando como generar recursos, pero con la ayuda de un préstamo y con una idea logro montar una tienda de abarrotes, desde que tiene la tienda Juana ha podido mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, ella lleva un alimento digno, sus hijos estudian y sonríen porque son felices.
Este negocio ha sido una salvación total y se trazó el objetivo de mantenerlo prospero en el tiempo.
Con la ayuda de un crédito Sandra quiere abastecer su tienda de abarrotes, comprando productos que no son cultivados en la zona y algunos víveres del diario usar.
texts.en:
In 2010 Juana started a business that changed her life completely.

She is the mother of 2 children who are 6 and 8 years old. She was unemployed, looking for a way to make an income, but with an idea and the help of a loan she managed to set up a grocery store.

Since then, she has been able to improve her family's living conditions. She puts food on the table, her kids study and they smile because they are happy. This business has been a real lifesaver and she has set her mind on keeping it thriving through time.

With the help of a loan, Sandra wants to stock her grocery store, buying products that are not grown in the area and some everyday foods.

loans.use: to stock her grocery store, buying products that are not grown in the area and some everyday foods.

loans.name: Torre Fuerte Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “TORRE FUERTE” iniciará el décimo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por nombre  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Teodora es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de mantas, venta de comida, venta de ropa de bebe, venta de CD’s. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Teodora es integrante, ella indica que hace diez años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejidos de mantas; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace varios años mediante una amiga quien le enseñó la técnica de tejido y ella decidió implementar este conocimiento como medio de generación económica. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra palillos y lana por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el buen trato que le ofrecen las funcionarias de la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank 'Torre Fuerte' [Strong Tower] will begin its tenth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Panamericana. The group is composed of the members named below, and it is directed by a board, on which Señora Teodora sits as the President. The members of the group are taking various businesses forward, and among them are businesses selling blankets, food, baby clothes and CDs. 

This loan will benefit the owners of small businesses, such as Teodora. She says that she joined Pro Mujer ten years ago following an invitation from a friend who is a client of the institution. Nowadays, she has a blanket and textile business. She says that she started this business several years ago after a friend taught her how to weave. Teodora decided to implement this knowledge as a means of generating income. 

The loan that she is currently taking out is for the growth of her business capital: buying knitting needles and wool at wholesale. She will buy these materials from vendors in El Alto. She will then make her products and sell them in her shop space. This form of work allows her to generate an income to support her family, since she is single and has a son.

When she was asked what she liked about Pro Mujer, she said that she liked the good treatment that the she receives from the staff at the organisation.

loans.use: to buy knitting needles and wool at wholesale.

loans.name: Isaias De Jesus

texts.es:
Isaias es un joven de 24 años de edad, de momento su rostro se encuentra vendado debido a un accidente que tuvo, es soltero pero quiere triunfar quiere salir de la pobreza, buscar un mejor futuro para su familia y en un futuro poder tener una pareja estable con la cual tener hijos.
El planea iniciar un su propio negocio que será la cría de ganado bovino, por lo que solicita su apoyo para comprar dos vacas con ellas iniciara una actividad económica en la que espera prosperar y superar su difícil situación económica.
texts.en:
Isaias is a young man at 24 years old. His face is currently partly covered by a bandage due to an accident. He wants to be successful, to get himself out of poverty, provide a better future for his family and, although he is currently single, he wants to find a stable partner with whom he could have children. 

He plans to start his own business in raising cattle and to this end, he is asking for a loan to buy two cows and use these to start his business, which he hopes will help him prosper and overcome his difficult financial situation.

loans.use: to buy two cows and use these to start his business.

loans.name: Karla Elizabeth

texts.es:
El reloj marca las 5 de la mañana, cuando Karla despierta y se prepara para otro día de trabajo. Ella es propietaria de un taller de soldadura que es el principal sustento de su hogar. El negocio lo inició hace más de 6 años, cuando su esposo le propuso que entre los dos, abrieran un taller. Idea que la consideró ambiciosa pues les serviría para ofrecerles un mejor futuro a sus 3 hijos.  

En la actualidad, es un taller sólido y próspero, con una amplia demanda; porque ofrece sus servicios en toda su zona. Karla, solicita el financiamiento para la comprar de materiales básicos como: hierro, cobre, plomo y plata. Los que le servirán de gran utilidad para cumplir con los pedidos.
texts.en:
The clock says 5 in the morning when Karla gets up and prepares for another work day. She is the owner of a welding shop which is the main support for the home. She started the business more than 6 years ago, when her husband proposed that the two of them open a shop. She considered the idea to be ambitious because it will serve them to offer their 3 children a better future. 

Right now it is a solid and prosperous shop with a lot of demand, because it offers services in the whole area. Karla is asking for the loan to buy basic materials such as iron, copper, lead and silver. This will be very useful to them for filling orders.

loans.use: to buy basic materials such as iron, copper, lead and silver.

loans.name: Yuly Rubiela

texts.es:
Yuly es una mujer emprendedora de 28 años de edad, madre de dos hijas de 4 y 3 años y casada. 

Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado en diferentes talleres de confecciones como operaria de máquina, razón por la cual posee experiencia y conocimientos en el manejo de este tipo de negocios; pero, ya cansada de trabajar en otros talleres y con el ánimo de pasar más tiempo con sus hijas, decidió emprender su propio taller de confección, para lo cual se anima a solicitar el crédito que será invertido en la compra de 2 maquinas fileteadoras, e insumos de confección como tela e hilos. 

Esto le permitirá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera generar un buen impacto en el sector para que le genere una rentabilidad favorable y así lograr cumplir el sueño de posicionarse en el mercado. 

Con su empuje y ambición se proyecta en un futuro a mediano plazo generando empleo siempre de la mano de la Corporación Interactuar
texts.en:
Yuly is a enterprising woman. She is 28 years old, married and a mother to two daughters of 4 and 3 years old.

During her working life she has worked as a machine operator in a variety of sewing workshops, so she has experience and knowledge in running this type of business. However, as she became tired of working in other shops and wanted to spend more time with her daughters, she decided to start her own sewing workshop. She is requesting a loan to buy 2 overlock sewing machines, and supplies such as fabric and thread. 

This will allow her to start her productive project that she hopes will have a good impact in her area so that she can generate good profits. She wants to achieve her dream of positioning herself in the market.

With her drive and ambition and always with the help of the Interactuar Corporation, she hopes that in the not too distant future, she can generate employment for others.

loans.use: to buy 2 overlock sewing machines, and supplies such as fabric and thread.

loans.name: Maria Xenia

texts.es:
María, de 59 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, es madre soltera, tiene 4 ahijos pero en su casa solo vive con una hija.
 
María, tiene 2 años de tener una pequeña tienda en su casa, decidio poner la tienda ya que no habia ninguna cerca de la zona donde reside.- Además, se dedica a la agricultura y con ganado, en la tienda le ayuda una hija. 

El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar más productos para la tienda y para comprar una vaca.

Los sueños de María, son hacer crecer la tienda y además desea poco a poco ir comprando ganado, para aprovechar la leche.
texts.en:
María is 59 years old. She went to school up to the first grade. She is a single mother of 4 children, but only one daughter lives with her in her house.  
 
María has a small store in her house for 2 years. She decided to open the store because there wasn't one nearby in the area where she lives. In addition, she works in agriculture and with cattle. A daughter helps her in the store.  

The loan will be used to buy more products for the store and to buy a cow. 

María's dream is to expand the store and also buy cattle little by little. to use the milk.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store and to buy a cow.

loans.name: Torre Fuerte Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “TORRE FUERTE” iniciará el vigésimo sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Martha es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de mantas, tienda de barrio, venta de perfumes, venta de ropa deportiva, venta de salchipapas, servicio de construcción, venta de juguetes, venta de enaguas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Martha es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo implementó sola al identificar su buen sazón y un pequeño capital, decide buscar el espacio donde vender y desde ese entonces realiza esta actividad misma que le es de mucha ayuda económica.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de papa y arroz por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene seis hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “TORRE FUERTE” communal bank will start its twenty sixth cycle in Pro Mujer as a part of the Los Andes Center. It is made up of eight members and led by a board of directors of which Martha is the president. The businesses that the members of the communal bank have are varied. Among them are: selling blankets, a neighborhood store, selling perfume, selling athletic clothes, selling salchipapas, construction service, selling toys, and selling underskirts.

The loan they will take out will benefit the micro-businesswomen, including Martha. She says that she joined Pro Mujer three years ago, joining at the invitation of a friend, who is a client of the institution. Right now, she has a business selling food. She says that she started this business on her own after identifying her good cooking skills and with a little capital. She decided to seek a space to sell from and since then she has done this activity which helps her financially a lot. 
 
The loan she will take out now is to increase capital by buying potatoes and rice wholesale. She will acquire them from wholesalers in the city of La Paz and after preparation she will sell them in her sales space. This work allows her to generate financial resources for her family, because she is single and has six children.  

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the area of health that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy potatoes and rice wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy smoked fish for resale.

loans.name: Josefa Del Carme

texts.es: Josefa es una mujer laboriosa que tiene la edad de 45 años, acompañada, se dedica a la comercialización de frutas en el mercado de la municipalidad, este negocio o impulsó hace veintiún años con la ayuda financiera de su compañero de vida, es el décimo noveno ciclo que ADIM le brinda el financiamiento para su negocio y ha demostrado ser una mujer responsable con sus cuotas de pagos, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de tamarindo, mango y naranja, con los créditos anteriores ha logrado ofrecer los productos de acuerdo a la temporada ya que compra al por mayor y vende al detalle.
texts.en:
Josefa is a hard-working woman. She is 45 years old and lives with her partner. She makes a living selling fruit at the municipal market. She started this business 21 years ago with the financial support of her life partner. This is the 19th loan cycle in which ADIM has provided her with financial support for her business. She has proven to be responsible and reliable with her payments.

The loan that she is asking for is to buy tamarind, mango and orange. With previous loans she has managed to offer her products based on the season as she buys them wholesale and sells them retail.

loans.use: to buy tamarind, mango and orange.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Agée de 37 ans, Afi est une femme mariée et vit avec ses quatre enfants  à Adakpamé. Pour exercer une activité et disposer d’un revenu pour répondre à ses besoins, Afi est une couturière qui vend des habits qu’elle coud à la mesure de ses clients. Afi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé. Pour acheter des tissus de pagnes, et réaliser de nouvelles tenues, Afi demande ce crédit pour financer sa commande afin de satisfaire agréablement ses clients et trouver le bénéfice pour étendre son activité.
texts.en: 37 years old, Afi is a married woman and she lives with her four children in Adakpamé. In order to generate income to cover her needs, Afi is a seamstress who sells custom-made dresses to her customers. Afi buys her supplies twice a month at the Grand Marché in Lomé. In order to purchase traditional 'pagne' fabric and to make new outfits, she is requesting this loan to finance the order. Thus she will meet her customers' demand and create the profit needed to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase three rolls of traditional cloth fabric.

loans.name: Adjoavi

texts.fr: Agée de 54 ans, Adjoavi est une femme mariée et vit avec ses deux enfants à Mayakopé. Pour exercer une activité et disposer d’un revenu pour répondre aux besoins de la famille, Adjoavi vend des engrais chimiques aux clients et en particuliers aux agriculteurs de sa région. Adjoavi s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au quartier administratif de Lomé. Adjoavi désire acheter des sacs d’engrais et demande ce crédit pour financer sa commande afin de satisfaire agréablement ses clients dans leurs productions.
texts.en:
Adjoavi is 54 years old, married and lives with her two children in Mayakopé.  In order to earn a living to help support her family, Adjoavi sells chemical fertilizers to farmers in her local area.

She buys her supplies four times a month from the administrative district of Lomé.  Adjoavi would like to buy further sacks of fertilizer for resale, so she has requested this loan.  This will allow her to meet the demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy 9 sacks of fertilizer for resale.

loans.name: Lissa

texts.fr: Lissa vit à Akodessewa et est agée de 39 ans. Elle est une femme mariée et habite avec ses cinq enfants. Pour mieux subvenir aux besoins de la famille, Lissa vend de la pate emballée préparée à l’aide du maïs et accompagnée par des poissons et de la viande. Ce commerce lui permet d’avoir un revenu pouvant aider son mari dans les charges quotidiennes. Lissa s’approvisionne  une  fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé pour avoir ses marchandises pour la préparation. Lissa demande ce prêt pour acheter des sacs de maïs, des cartons de poissons et de la viande afin de réaliser son bénéfice.
texts.en:
Lissa is 39 years old and lives in Akodessewa.  She is married and lives with her five children.  To allow her to help provide for the needs of her family, Lissa sells maize meal, accompanied by fish or meat.  This gives her an income which she uses to help her husband with their day-to-day expenses.

Lissa buys her provisions once a month from the main market in Lomé.  She has requested this loan to buy sacks of maize, boxes of fish and meat, and make a profit.

loans.use: to buy 1 sack of maize, 2 boxes of fish and 4 chickens for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Afiwa

texts.fr: Afiwa est une femme mariée de 48 ans qui vit à Kpota. Elle vit avec sa famille et s’évertue activement pour gagner sa vie et subvenir à leurs besoins quotidiens. Pour parvenir à ses fins, Afiwa vend des noix de coco qu’elle expose à ses clients qui lui procurent une bonne rentabilité dans son activité. Afiwa s’approvisionne à Kpémé pour acheter les noix. Grâce  à son dynamisme, Afiwa sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des sacs de noix de coco afin de répondre favorablement aux attentes de ses clients et gagner une bonne marge bénéficiaire.
texts.en:
Afiwa is 48 years old, married and lives in Kpota.  She lives with her family and works hard to earn a living and provide for the daily needs of her family.  Afiwa makes a good profit from selling coconuts.  She buys her supplies from Kpémé.

Thanks to her dynamism, Afiwa has requested this loan to buy sacks of coconuts to meet the demands of her customers and earn a good profit.

loans.use: to buy 50 sacks of coconuts for resale.

loans.name: Kokoè

texts.fr: Kokoè vit à Adakpamé et est âgée de 34 ans. Etant une femme mariée elle s’occupe de la charge de ses enfants. Pour entreprendre une activité rémunératrice de revenu,  Kokoè vend des pagnes et des objets plastiques dans son quartier pour gagner son revenu. Kokoè achète ses produits au grand marché de Lomé deux fois par mois afin d’avoir en permanence un stock disponible. Kokoè veut commander des tissus de pagnes et des sceaux en plastiques et demande ce microcrédit pour réaliser son achat et continuer son activité.
texts.en:
Kokoè is 34 years old and lives in Adakpamé.  She is a married woman and takes care of her children.  In order to earn a living, Kokoè sells pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) and plastic items.  She buys her supplies from the main market in Lomé, twice a month to maintain her stock levels.

Kokoè needs to order more pagnes and plastic buckets, so she has requested this loan to continue her business.

loans.use: to buy 6 pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) and 15 plastic buckets for resale.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi vit à Cassablanca  et est âgée de 32 ans. Elle est une femme mariée qui s’occupe de la charge de ses trois enfants. Pour entreprendre une activité rémunératrice de revenu,  Afi vend des céréales dans son quartier pour gagner son revenu. Afi achète ses produits au marché deux fois par mois afin d’avoir en permanence un stock disponible. Afi veut commander des sacs de maïs et demande ce microcrédit pour réaliser son achat et continuer son activité.
texts.en: Afi lives in Cassablanca  and is 32 years old. She is a married woman who takes care of her three children. In order to have an income-generating activity, Afi sells cereals in her neighbourhood. She buys her products at the market twice a month in order to always have stock available. Afi wants to order sacks of corn and is requesting this micro-loan in order to make this purchase and to continue her business.

loans.use: to buy 30 bowls of corn.

loans.name: Famille Basinyize Group

texts.fr: Alors qu'il n'avait que 20 ans, Emmanuel a reçu de ses parents une étendue de terre dans laquelle il y a planté des caféiers. Ce geste était une façon de lui permettre de s'organiser pour préparer son mariage. Ce crédit lui permettra de couvrir les charges liées à l'entretien de son champ car la main d'oeuvre locale n'est pas permanente. Grâce à cette activité, il souhaite dans un proche avenir réhabiliter sa maison d'habitation, assurer le paiement des frais scolaires de ses enfants et améliorer les conditions sociales ainsi que vitales de sa famille. Il est sur la photo avec son épouse Suzane.
texts.en:
When he was just 20 years old, Emmanuel received a parcel of land from his parents - on which there are coffee bushes planted. This was done to allow him to get settled and to prepare for his marriage.
This loan will allow him to cover the expenses of maintaining his field, as the local labour pool is not permanent. 
Thanks to this activity, he hopes to renovate his home in the near future, and also to pay his childrens' school fees and to improve the family's social and health conditions. He is in the photo alongside his wife Suzane.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance on his land.

loans.name: Béatrice

texts.fr: Agée de 36 ans, Béatrice est une femme veuve et vit avec son enfant  à Nyékonakpoè. Pour exercer une activité et disposer d’un revenu pour répondre à ses besoins, Béatrice vend des produits d’alimentations générales à son domicile. Béatrice s’approvisionne cinq fois par mois. Pour acheter des oignons, Béatrice demande ce crédit pour financer sa commande afin de satisfaire agréablement ses clients et trouver le bénéfice pour étendre son activité.
texts.en: 36 years old, Béatrice is a widow who lives in Nyékonakpoè. In order to make an income to meet her needs, Béatrice sells groceries from her home. She buys her supplies five times a month. Béatrice is requesting this loan in order to finance the purchase of onions, to be able to meet the demand from her customers and to make the profit needed to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of onions.

loans.name: Cjfdt 25 Group

texts.fr: CJFDT 25 est un sous groupe affilié à la Convergence des Jeunes et Femmes pour le Développement de Tassette. Il est composé de 06 personnes qui sont toutes des femmes. Elles habitent dans le même village de Tassette et veulent lutter contre la pauvreté. Elles se réunissent chaque fin de mois pour organiser des tontines. AMY est la présidente de ce sous groupe, elle est reconnue sur la photo par la main levée, elle et marié et mère de 5 enfants dont le plus grand agé de 20 ans suit des cours à l'université et la plus petite est une fille de 6 ans et elle est à l'école primaire de sa commune. Elle évolue dans la commercialisation des fruits et légumes et a une expérience de plus de 5ans dans cette activité. Elle sollicite ce montant pour acheter des fruits et légumes qu'elle revend dans le marché de la place. Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Amy souhaite à l'avenir ouvrir une grande boutique d'alimentation générale dans le marché de la ville. Ainsi elle pourra augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille et épargner beaucoup d'argent
texts.en:
CJFDT 25 is a sub-group affiliated to the "Convergence des Jeunes et Femmes pour le Développement de Tassette" (Women and Youth Movement for the Development of Tassette). It is composed of six women, all of whom live in the village of Tassette and want to fight poverty. 
They meet once a month in order to organise communal loan activities. Amy is the president of this sub-group, and she appears in the photo with her hand raised. She is married and the mother of five children, the eldest of whom is 20 and is pursuing a university degree, and the youngest is a girl of 6 who attends the local primary school.
She is a seller of fruits and vegetables and has over five year's experience in this domain. She is requesting this loan in order to buy fruits and vegetables which she sells in the local market. 
She assists her husband with the family's daily living expenses, and the children's schooling fees. Amy hopes in the future to open a large grocery store in the town's market. Thus she will be able to grow her income and the family's living conditions, and also save significant sums of money.

loans.use: to purchase fruit and vegetables to sell at the market.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
Petrona, de 59 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, es madre soltera de 2 hijos, los cuales dependen económicamente de ella.

Petrona, se dedica a la agricultura, la ganadería y a la venta de pollo de engorde, decidió dedicarse al negocio de pollo ya que recibió una capacitación por parte de una ONG, que llego  a la comunidad, el negocio lo tiene en su propia casa.

Petrona, necesita el crédito para comprar pollos de engorde y una vaca, con esto aumentará la cantidad de pollos y así obtendrá mayores ingresos.

El sueño de Petrona, es hacer una casa de bloque, ya que donde vive es de barro.
texts.en:
Petrona is 59 years old. She went to school up until second grade. She is a single mother with two children who are financially dependent on her.    

Petrona works in argriculture, livestock farming and she sells broiler chickens. She decided to start selling chickens from her own home after she received training from an NGO that came to the region.   

Petrona, needs the loan to buy broiler chickens and a cow. This will increase the number of chickens she has and, as a result, her income will also increase.   

Petrona's dream is to build a cinderblock home because she currently lives in a house made of clay.

loans.use: to buy broiler chickens and a cow.

loans.name: Heam

texts.en:
Heam, 33, lives in Kompong Cham Province of Cambodia. He has three dependent children. To make a living, he manages and operates a farming business, primarily growing corn and chili and he sells his agricultural produce to local dealers. So far, he has been in this type of business for fifteen years. On average, he is able to make an income of 3 USD a day.

In this farming season, he lacks money to buy some farm supplies. To continue his farming, he is borrowing some money from Kiva now to buy farm supplies like fertilizers, seeds and insecticides.  He is thankful to lenders for the financial support. He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like fertilizers, seeds and insecticides

loans.name: Silvia Mikaela

texts.es:
Silvia es una joven mujer de 22 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de contabilidad. 
Ella es inteligente, responsable, comprometida con sus estudios, constante, dulce, cariñosa, sensible y sincera. Sus estudios lo realiza en un instituto técnico de estudios contables en la zona de ‘Villa Fátima’, un lugar caracterizado por el comercio informal y por la terminal de buses con destino a poblaciones del norte de la ciudad, de clima frio y ventoso, vientos que llegan de la cordillera a una altura de 3600 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Silvia es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa suelto, su lengua materna es el Aymará el cual ya no utiliza porque sus estudios lo realiza en español y estudia inglés como segunda lengua. Su vida la realiza junto a su madre que trabaja como comerciante, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con los servicios de electricidad, gas domiciliario, agua potable y alcantarillado. Ella cursa la carrera de contabilidad y se encuentra en 1 año de 3 años que dura la carrera; disfruta realizar cuentas, le gusta entender los gastos y costos, su carácter es de servicio. Paralelamente a sus estudios ella trabaja como asistente contable en una empresa. “quiero terminar mis estudios lo más rápido posible para ayudar en los gastos de mi hogar…” comenta. Su sueño es ser profesional para conseguir un buen empleo y desea realizar la compra de una computadora portátil para hacer sus tareas. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que se dedica al estudio profesional. 
Es por esos motivos que Silvia solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora portátil para realizar sus tareas y terminar su carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Silvia, age 22, is single and has no children.  She is studying for a degree in accounting.  She is intelligent, responsible, committed to her studies, persistent, sweet, affectionate, sensitive, and sincere.  She is attending a technical institution for accounting in the Villa Fátima area.  This place is known for its informal trade, for the bus terminal to places north of the city, for its cold and windy climate, and for its winds that come from the mountain range at an altitude of 3600 meters above sea level.

Silvia has a dark complexion and long dark hair that she wears down.  Her mother tongue is Aymará, which she no longer uses because her studies are in Spanish, and she is studying English as a second language.  She lives with her mother, who works as a merchant.  They live in their own house made of brick with a roof made of metal sheeting. Their home has electricity, gas, running water, and indoor plumbing.

She is studying for an accounting degree.  She is in her first year of a three year program.  She enjoys working with accounts, and she likes understanding expenses and costs.  Her nature is to serve.

In addition to her studies, she works as an assistant accountant at a company.  “I want to finish my education as quickly as possible in order to help with the household expenses,” she says.

Her dream is to be a professional in order to get a good job.  She wishes to buy a laptop computer in order to do her school work.  This is her first loan cycle with the institution in her first year of studying to be a professional.

It is for these reasons that Silvia is requesting a loan to buy a laptop computer to do her school work and to get her professional degree.

loans.use: to buy a laptop computer to do her school work and to get her professional degree.

loans.name: Nerio

texts.en:
Nerio is from Mobod, Oroquieta, in the Philippines. He and his wife have a poultry business. They raise laying chickens for egg-selling. 

Recently, Nerio availed himself of a loan to purchase nails and sticks to repair his chicken cages. Nerio deeply wishes to sell more eggs from his poultry, to save enough money to benefit his family.

loans.use: to purchase nails and sticks to repair his chicken cages

loans.name: Lera

texts.en:
Lera  is 39 years old and married with two children; both of them are in school.

Lera  works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Lera  has borrowed and repaid 25 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

Lera  aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
Salvador es un hombre de 28 años es casado, vive junto a su familia de 2 hijos en una comunidad de Sololá.
Para generar sus ingresos mensuales Salvador desde hace 6 años se dedica a la compra y venta de bananos, para Salvador esta actividad es bastante productiva pues lo realiza desde su casa y le permite estar más tiempo con su familia, para salvador su familia es lo más importante y por eso se preocupa por las necesidades que ellos tienen y  él quiere que su familia no sufra de necesidades, él ha pensado en otro fuente de ingreso y la otra forma es cultivar café y banano pero para hacerlo se necesita de un terreno, terreno con el que él es este momento no cuenta, entonces él tiene la iniciativa de comprar un terreno pero una de los impedimentos de Salvador es que no cuenta con un buen dinero para poder comprar, por tal razón él solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá para comparar un terreno.
El gran deseo de Salvador es contar con el préstamo para que él pueda realizar su compra y mejorar sus ingresos para poner colocar un depósito de banano.
texts.en:
Salvador is a 28-year-old married man who lives with his family of two children in a town in Sololá.

To earn his monthly salary, Salvador has been working buying and selling banana trees for the past six years. This activity is quite profitable for Salvador as he works from home and it allows him to spend more time with his family. Family is of utmost importance to Salvador, which is why he cares about their needs and doesn't want his family to go without.

He has thought about another source of income, that of growing coffee as well as banana trees. However, to do this he needs a plot of land, which he doesn't have at the moment. As a result, he wants to buy some land. However, Salvador doesn't have enough money to do so, which is why he is requesting a loan to invest in buying land. 

Salvador's biggest dream is to get the loan so that he can make his purchase and boost his earnings, in order to set up a banana storage facility.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Lourdes works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and raising livestock. Lourdes is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business.

Lourdes has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Golethan

texts.en:
26 years ago, Golethan (pictured) got married and shortly ventured into farming using her husband's half an acre land as capital. Today, Golethan is a mother of six children with 3 cows, a dozen head of poultry, 80 trees and a tea farm in her name. 

Golethan is seeking a loan investment from Kiva lenders to grow the product portfolio of her rural enterprise. With your money, she will buy cereal grains, transport them to further markets, and sell them at a greater profit margin. Cereals can also be a source of seeds during planting season for farmers. 

One of Golethan's goals is to elevate the quality of life her family is leading, and you can help by investing $25 in the future of Golethan

loans.use: to pay for cereals to transport to market and resell at a profit

loans.name: Aireen

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Aireen works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock.  Aireen is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more snack foods to sell for her food vending business.
